{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Deco |revision=M4R (US) v1.0 |series=AC1200 |asin=B07NF6V8SC |price=180 |est_release_date=04/01/2019 |fcc_date=10/19/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Proware |type=wireless system, mesh node |fcc_id=TE7M4R |ic_id=8853A-M4R |pcb_id=1803142WNR-1.0 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=750 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3R1GE40JBF-8F |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9886 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N;QCA8337N-AL3C; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, DFS (master), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi System}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/us/home-networking/deco/deco-m4}} "1803142WNR-1.0 Rev1.0sp1" is silkscreened on the main board. ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9563 @750MHz WiSoC *Dual-Band Wi-Fi: single SSID with 802.11abgn/ac *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 1x LAN GbE *Dedicated Mobile App ===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/tp-link-deco-m4-review ''TP-LINK Deco M4 Review'' on '''DigitalCitizen'''] ===See also=== :[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M4R]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M5]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M6 v1.0]] *[[TP-LINK Deco M9 Plus V1]] *[[TP-LINK Deco P7 v1.x]] *[[TP-LINK HC220-G1]] *[[TP-LINK M53]] __NOTOC__
